title: The reason for the revelation of Surah Al-Jinn, its explanation, virtues and purposes

preview.html: The reason for the revelation of Surat Al-Jin, its explanation, virtue, and purposes. All the surahs of the Holy Qur’an contain many rulings and messages that God Almighty wants or conveys to His servants, and among the surahs that bring many miracles and knowledge and explain many concepts about the world of the jinn to people are the surahs of the jinn that descended upon the Messenger of God, may God bless him and grant him peace, in Mecca, so In this article, we will learn together about the reason for the revelation of Surat Al-Jinn, the explanation, and the explanation. Virtues and their purposes. The reason for the revelation of Surah Al-Jinn in the Holy Qur’an. Surah Al-Jinn is one of the Meccan surahs that was revealed to the Messenger of God, may God bless him and grant him peace, while he was in Mecca and called on the people of Quraysh to convert to Islam before he went to Medina. Inside the surah are twenty-eight verses from the Qur’an. God revealed Surah Al-Jinn to tell us what they did to the Messenger of God, may God bless him and grant him peace, while he went to Souk Ukaz to introduce the people of Mecca to Islam and abandon paganism and faith. There is no god but Him. After that, the Prophet went with his companions to perform the dawn prayer in a valley near Mecca called Wadi Al-Jinn, and at that time many jinn heard our honorable Messenger reciting some verses of the Qur’an. Then the jinn went to their families to do what they heard about words that no one had heard before. Because of these verses, the jinn believed in God and His Messenger Muhammad, may God bless him and grant him peace, and then returned to their tribe to invite them to embrace Islam. Explanation of Surah Al-Jinn in the Qur’anIn this section we discuss the explanation of the verses of Surah The jinn and the interpretation of the verses from verse number one to verse five, and we mention the interpretations of religious scholars in detail in the following: The verses tell us about the reason for the revelation of Surah Al-Jinn and what happened to the tribe of Satan when they learned that he was misleading them and lying to them, and because they heard about a messenger who had converted to Islam. “Say, ‘It was revealed to me that a group They heard from the jinn and said, “We have heard a wondrous Qur’an.” As for the second verse of Surat Al-Jinn: It leads to righteousness, so we believe in it and do not associate with our Lord. He explained it: that the jinn know the path of the jinn and the truth, and that they worship God alone. The scholars have interpreted the fourth verse of Surat Al-Jinn, which contains the text: “He is the grandfather of our Lord. He did not take a partner or a friend.” He did not have God and will never have a son or family. The fifth verse of the Surah explained that Satan lied to his people and was the reason for their misguidance and distance from God. What are the purposes of Surat Al-Jinn? The scholars of Sharia and Islam explained the reason for the revelation of Surat Al-Jinn and the verses of the Surah to Muslims, and they explained each verse. The reason for its revelation and they mentioned it so that the believer understands it and is admonished, and draws closer to God with good deeds. The interpretation of the verse number came from Surat Al-Jinn, which is the admiration of the jinn for the verses of God because of the reproach and wisdom they contain, and therefore they decided to stay away from false beliefs, disbelief, and disbelief. Polytheism. Then they enter into the religion of God and His monotheism. As for the seventh verse of the surah, God Almighty intended to narrate the condition of the jinn and their misunderstanding that there is no resurrection after death or resurrection, and their awareness of the lies of Satan who wanted to mislead his people. And in verse no. Concerning Surah Al-Jinn, God Almighty said: (Say: When did you know your time or did my Lord give it time?). Scholars explained this verse that God knows the unseen and the Day of Resurrection, and that no one knows

Polytheism. Then they enter into the religion of God and His monotheism. As for the seventh verse of the surah, God Almighty intended to narrate the condition of the jinn and their misunderstanding that there is no resurrection after death or resurrection, and their awareness of the lies of Satan who wanted to mislead his people. And in verse no. Concerning Surah Al-Jinn, God Almighty said: (Say: When did you know your time or did my Lord give it time?). Scholars explained this verse that God knows the unseen and the Day of Resurrection, and that no one knows

title: Interpretation of seeing a mouse attack in a dream and escaping from it

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a rat attack in a dream: It is considered an unfavorable vision because of the intense fear that the dreamer feels, as roots are not among the animals that the human soul is happy with, but their presence in the house only portends bad things at first. Therefore, in this article, we show you the Encyclopedia website for the complete interpretation of seeing a mouse. Interpretation of seeing a mouse attack in a dream While seeing a mouse alone is a scary thing, what if you dream of a mouse attacking you, this is definitely something that scares you, and you may be right as follows: Seeing animals and insects that... Being attacked, including by rats, it can be evidence of magic that someone has done to harm you, but to be sure of this sign, there must be a repetition in this dream and not from the first time, but this dream can happen to you every night a sign On witchcraft. In addition to this dream, there must also be evidence about your life, as there must be a change for the worse that affects all aspects of your professional, social and other life, which confirms that witchcraft has become harmful to you. Seeing a group of mice attacking the house may mean That there is envy affecting the house with its people and that he must monitor the image of the cow and the legal rukia to get rid of the serious damage to it. This can affect their lives a lot as family members can get separated, have problems and get sick. For no reason, they reduced their worship, and there is indifference in the spirit of the house, and all this is because of the envy that enters their house, so they must beware of all the people who enter their house, because not everyone wishes them a happy Zoe. Seeing a mouse trying to throw the fortuneteller and attack him is evidence that there are many There are enemies lurking about him, wanting evil for him, and trying to manipulate him to leave a bad impact on his life and destroy him. Therefore, he must be careful, especially from those close to him recently, because they are the cause of his harm. Escaping from a mouse in a dream. If you see in a dream that there is a mouse or a group of mice trying to attack you, but you are trying to escape from them, this means: You are a coward who never likes confrontation. The problems that you face in your life and that you are running away from them instead of trying to solve them, but this does not mean that the problems disappear as if they do not exist, but rather it indicates that the problems exist for you and they are looking for you and you are the one who decides... whether to continue escaping or confronting them. If a rat tries Attacking one of your children and encouraging him to leave, it means that there is bad news after that son and that there is evil that will happen to him, but you are trying hard to keep this evil away from him. And you may actually succeed in this. If you see that there is a mouse running after you and you are in a place empty of people and you are trying to escape by force, this may indicate that there are many fears that are trying to disturb your life and that you yourself never feel happy in your life and that there are many fears that It may destroy you soon, so you have to face all these fears and recalculate and organize your life instead of escaping from it. Interpretation of seeing a mouse in a dream for a single woman.

title: Interpretation of a dream about circumambulating the Prophet’s grave in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about circumambulating the grave of the Prophet in a dream. There are many explanations for this. Below we learn about the interpretation of a dream of circumambulating the Prophet’s grave in a dream and other details that will interest you.Interpretation of a dream of circumambulating the Prophet’s grave in a dream.Interpretation of a dream of circumambulating the Prophet’s grave in a dream. Seeing the grave of the Messenger can be a role model, and God knows the unseen, as it may indicate following the example of the Messenger, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees the grave of the Messenger, this may mean that he is following the example of the Messenger and following his method, and God Almighty knows. When a married man sees the grave of the Messenger in a dream, this may be evidence. On the good, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of dreams to see the grave of the Prophet in the wrong place in a dream. Interpretation of dreams to see the grave of the Prophet in the wrong place in a dream. Seeing the grave of the Prophet being transported to a place he knows may indicate the righteousness of the people of the place, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. When a married man sees the grave of the Prophet, it may be a sign of material changes for the better, and God knows best. If a young man sees himself carrying the grave of the Prophet to a place he knows in a dream, This may be a sign of righteousness for the people of the place, and God knows the unseen. When we see the Prophet’s grave being moved to an unknown place, this may be a sign of a lack of religion, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about seeing the Prophet Saleh in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing the Prophet Saleh in a dream could be a sign of anxiety, but he is spared from it. And God is Most High and Most Knowing. Where some people may express worries, but God relieves them of worries, and God knows the unseen. When a single young man sees the Prophet Saleh in a dream, this could be a sign of patience and forbearance. Where he may express your constant anxiety and the difficulties you are going through, and God knows best. Interpretation of the dream of praying on the grave of the Messenger in... Dream Interpretation of dreams about praying on the grave of the Prophet in a dream Praying on the grave of the Prophet can be a reference for achieving goals, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If the dreamer sees the grave of the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, perhaps it is a sign of goodness, and God knows best. When an unmarried girl sees the grave of the Prophet, it can lead to justice, and God knows best. I know the unseen. If the dreamer sees the grave of the Prophet Muhammad in a dream, it may be good evidence for the dreamer, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about seeing the grave of the Prophet Muhammad in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing the grave of the Prophet Muhammad in a dream may indicate following his Sunnah, and God knows the unseen. Also, seeing a visit to the grave of the Prophet Muhammad may indicate Religiosity and piety, and God knows the unseen. If you see the clip on the grave of the Messenger, it may indicate prayers upon the Prophet, and God knows best. But if the dreamer sees the grave of the Messenger broken or cracked, this may indicate distance and abandonment in worship, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about kissing the grave of the Messenger in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about kissing a grave The Messenger in a dream. Seeing the grave of the Messenger expresses goodness and living, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. It may also express abandonment of disobedience and sins, and God knows the unseen. title: I dreamed that I was praying

preview.html: I dreamed that I performed prayer through the Vision website roy2a.com, and the structure of the prayer is a specific formula that is repeated for the purpose of preparing believers to prepare to begin prayer and seeing the prayer being performed in the dream has multiple meanings if the man or woman is single, married, or pregnant, today through one of the Vision websites, we will discuss In detail, the interpretation of seeing prayer in a dream, based on the opinion of major commentators such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, Nabulsi, and Imam Al-Sadiq, so follow us. What is the interpretation of seeing someone praying in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Seeing someone praying in a dream expresses his desire to solve his problems and make positive changes in his life. Vision A person is praying in a dream, which is intended to alleviate his distress, alleviate his worries, improve his conditions, and facilitate his affairs. Seeing performing prayer in the mosque in a dream states that the dreamer is liberated from the problems and difficulties that stand in his way. See also: Interpretation of seeing yourself performing prayer in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing Holding prayer in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi: Seeing holding prayer in the mosque in a dream indicates good news and good news that will soon come to the monarch and indicates the fulfillment of wishes and desires. Seeing someone praying and crying in a dream shows that he is suffering because of the ordeal he is going through and cannot overcome it easily. Seeing The noon prayer in a dream indicates that the visionary person will pay his debts and get rid of them in the near future. See also: Interpretation of seeing prayer in a dream. Interpretation of seeing performing prayer in a dream for a man: Seeing a man praying in a dream indicates that the dreamer is suffering from many crises and obstacles on his way. A man performing prayers after staying in a dream indicates that he will receive many good things and abundant livelihood. Seeing a dwelling and then praying with someone in a dream indicates a close relationship and mutual dependence that brings them closer to reality. Seeing a dwelling and praying in the Kaaba indicates the dreamer’s commitment to religion and his closeness to reality. God Almighty. See also: Interpretation of seeing prayer clothes in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing establishing prayer in a dream for a single woman: Seeing an unmarried woman praying in a dream announces that he will soon be linked to the person he desires. Seeing an unmarried woman praying in a dream indicates comfort after distress and comfort after Hardship. Seeing an unmarried woman praying and starting her prayer in a dream announces that she will overcome all the problems she is going through and get rid of all the sadness that is hindering her life. Seeing an unmarried woman praying and praying with women in a dream indicates good morals and a good reputation among people. See also: Interpretation of seeing Jalal or Prayer wear in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing a married woman praying in a dream: Seeing a married woman praying in a dream indicates the sustenance and blessing that will be found in her home in the coming time. Seeing a married woman praying in a dream indicates that she will become pregnant soon, and God knows best. Seeing a married woman praying in a dream The dream shows that there are problems in her life that will be solved soon, her situations will be corrected and she will be in good condition and comfortable. Seeing a mother

Seeing a mother

title: Interpretation of a car accident in a dream for a relative, brother, friend, and different situations

preview.html: We present to you the interpretation of a car accident in a dream for a relative, a brother, a friend, and various situations, because a dream about a car accident is one of the most common dreams that causes a lot of terror and anxiety to the viewer and makes him feel very afraid. The dream. Some jurists believe that dreams about accidents may carry a warning message about something that will happen in the future and one must pay attention to it, so during our article today we will discuss the interpretation of a car accident in a dream, if it was for a relative or friend, or a car overturning accident or the death of a person and his screaming in the The detailed accident through the encyclopedia, follow us. Interpretation of a car accident in a dream A car accident in a dream symbolizes that the dreamer is facing major crises in his life. Commentators believe that seeing car accidents in a dream indicates the intense fear that the dreamer feels and the intense anxiety that surrounds him, and God Almighty is All-Knowing. However, if a person sees in a dream that there is a traffic accident resulting in deaths, this indicates the disappearance of the sorrows and worries that the dreamer suffers from in reality, and that God will save him from them, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If you dream of a car accident and the car lights go out, this means that the dreamer does not He has sufficient experience to make the right decisions. Whoever sees in his dream a car accident at sea, his dreams indicate that he is suffering from emotional problems with his life partner. To dream of a sinking car means that in reality the dreamer feels anxiety and fear. If someone dreams that he was in an accident A car and he was injured in it, the dream indicates that he made a wrong decision that will harm him. Interpretation of a dream about a car accident. As for an upside-down car accident in a dream, it is an indication that the dreamer fears for his dreams, goals, and future due to the obstacles he faces, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. While the visionary sees himself sitting next to the car driver. An accident occurs and the car overturns with them. This indicates that the insight is making decisions in his life that are imposed on him and he is not the one who has the say in them. God is Most High and Most Knowing. As for the dreamer who sees himself falling from a mountain with his car in a dream, this means that the dreamer will descend to a level lower than the current level. Among the dreams that foretell is a dream about a car overturning and the dreamer’s death. Another interpretation of this vision is the collapse of the dreamer’s worries and a change in his situation for the better. Interpretation of a dream about a car accident for a relative. Jurists believe that if the dream is about the dreamer’s brother, for example, then it is a sign of the existence of many disagreements between them, and it is a warning to the dreamer of the necessity of ending these disagreements and because preserving kinship and friendship. And kinship relationships. But if the dream is about a relative in the dream, this means that this relative needs some help and the dreamer must go to him and help him as much as he can. But if the dream is about the dreamer’s father who was involved in a traffic accident, then this is because of the dreamer’s feeling of being unable to solve the problem. Many problems that he suffers from without having a final solution, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a friend in a car accident. If the dream in the dreamer’s dream was a friend’s car accident, then this is a sign of the strong relationship between the dreamer and his friend, and his fear and concern for him, and this friend may have a problem.

If you dream of a car accident and the car lights go out, this means that the dreamer does not He has sufficient experience to make the right decisions. Whoever sees in his dream a car accident at sea, his dreams indicate that he is suffering from emotional problems with his life partner. To dream of a sinking car means that in reality the dreamer feels anxiety and fear. If someone dreams that he was in an accident A car and he was injured in it, the dream indicates that he made a wrong decision that will harm him. Interpretation of a dream about a car accident. As for an upside-down car accident in a dream, it is an indication that the dreamer fears for his dreams, goals, and future due to the obstacles he faces, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. While the visionary sees himself sitting next to the car driver. An accident occurs and the car overturns with them. This indicates that the insight is making decisions in his life that are imposed on him and he is not the one who has the say in them. God is Most High and Most Knowing. As for the dreamer who sees himself falling from a mountain with his car in a dream, this means that the dreamer will descend to a level lower than the current level. Among the dreams that foretell is a dream about a car overturning and the dreamer’s death. Another interpretation of this vision is the collapse of the dreamer’s worries and a change in his situation for the better. Interpretation of a dream about a car accident for a relative. Jurists believe that if the dream is about the dreamer’s brother, for example, then it is a sign of the existence of many disagreements between them, and it is a warning to the dreamer of the necessity of ending these disagreements and because preserving kinship and friendship. And kinship relationships. But if the dream is about a relative in the dream, this means that this relative needs some help and the dreamer must go to him and help him as much as he can. But if the dream is about the dreamer’s father who was involved in a traffic accident, then this is because of the dreamer’s feeling of being unable to solve the problem. Many problems that he suffers from without having a final solution, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a friend in a car accident. If the dream in the dreamer’s dream was a friend’s car accident, then this is a sign of the strong relationship between the dreamer and his friend, and his fear and concern for him, and this friend may have a problem.

title: Interpretation of teeth falling out in a dream for a married woman

preview.html: The dream of teeth falling out for a married woman, for a single woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, for a married or single man, because if I dream of my teeth falling out, then the effect of the upper and lower canine teeth and the wisdom teeth of Ibn Sirin, Nabulsi, Al-Sadiq and others. The dream of teeth falling out in a dream is one of the dreams that cause a lot of anxiety to the dreamer, Due to the spread of wrong interpretations of seeing teeth and their falling out in a dream, which some have argued portends the death of a family member, falling teeth in a dream indicate many other interpretations. Interpretation of teeth falling out in a dream for a married woman: A married woman who gave birth to children and saw her teeth falling out in her dreams, and this means that she is surrounded by her children. With great interest and excessive fear. Teeth falling out can lead to a temporary interruption of one’s source of livelihood, a passing financial crisis, or something like that. Teeth falling out in a dream indicates sadness in the dream because it indicates the loss of something important in life. Also, falling teeth indicates fear for those who It has real losses in life. Seeing teeth falling out in a dream. The interpretation of teeth falling out should not be fully predicted, except in the case of full knowledge of the dream, as in the case that you get something expensive in life and then dream that teeth are falling out in a dream, this is clear evidence that fear is in you. To lose what you have. If you enter into a romantic relationship and are afraid of losing the person you love, this indicates stress and pressure in life, so you see teeth falling out in a dream, which symbolizes the fear of losing love and connection. Interpretation of teeth falling out in a dreamIn a series of interpretations Ibn Sirin interpreted teeth falling out in a dream as follows: Seeing all the teeth falling out in a dream is evidence that he will live a long life. To see that all the teeth have fallen out without seeing them means that the people of the house are dying or getting sick. Seeing the upper teeth falling out in a dream Evidence that he will get money, and if they fall to the ground, this is evidence of death. Seeing the lower teeth falling out is an indication of pain, delusion, and distress. Seeing a debtor’s teeth falling out in a dream is a sign that he will pay his debts in full. Seeing teeth falling out with the inability to Eating is evidence of a person’s lack of strength. Since teeth falling out in a dream does not indicate in many interpretations something bad, but from most interpretations it shows some things that can harm a person. Interpretation of teeth falling out in a dream YouTube

title: Interpretation of someone telling you about death in a dream: Hearing the news of death in a dream

preview.html: Symbols that can predict the death of a specific person or the owner of the vision Symbol of the death of one of your relatives, whether known or unknown There are three known or common situations in dreams about this symbol: A familiar person tells you about death in a dream There are many dreams that involve dialogues and discussions between familiar people who live in your environment. These dialogues include indications or direct talk about the death of a specific person or are directed directly to the dreamer to tell him about death in a specific place or time, and in such cases this symbol has nothing to do with death other than it is classified in the speech of the soul and in the event that there are other symbols that have implications or interpretations of the dream according to these other symbols. An unknown person portends your death or the death of one of your relatives in a dream Seeing such an unknown person telling you about the death of one of your relatives or your imminent death, if you are a dreamer, either the speech or talk is direct or includes some sentences or words that express condolences or a hint of death in your environment. It is a necessary interpretation. Seeing the dead tells you about the death of a relative in a dream. The dead person in a dream has a special status and is often interested in interpreting dreams in which a dead person appears and takes what he says seriously because we believe and believe that the dead is in the house of truth and speaks only the truth. I have explained this issue on several occasions. . Regarding seeing such a familiar dead person telling you about the death of a relative, or this is mostly true, but the question is when the dream will come true. This cannot be determined. It can happen immediately after the dream upon waking up, and it can be delayed for months, both cases are possible. There are several cases and types of dreams that include symbols indicating death, and there are many of them, some of which are related to actions and movements, and some of which have nothing to do with the dreamer's health condition as well. As a context for the dream. Seeing someone telling you about your death in a dream

title: Interpretation of a dream about a house fire, its meaning and repercussions according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about a house fire. Many of us are confused to find interpretations of dreams about a house fire. Since this dream causes unparalleled panic for the dreamer, it definitely portends bad for the dreamer, so it needs a proper interpretation. Interpretation of the fire that burns the house. Through the different site you can learn about the interpretation of the dream about a house fire as follows: If The dreamer saw in his dream that his house was burning, but he found in his dream that his house was burning with something other than the fire he knew, so this vision is an indication that the dreamer will reap a lot. Nutrition from various sources through what is permissible and forbidden. In the event that the fire burned the dreamer’s household in his sleep, but they did not die and came out safely, the interpretation of this vision in it is an indication that the dreamer and his family will conspire against evil. By one of their relatives, but this hatred will never be harmed. While the ease of extinguishing a fire in the house is very simple, and without problems in the dreamer’s dream, in this vision it is an indication that the viewer of this vision will reconcile God between the disputing parties, and an indication that this person He is one of the righteous. Using water to put out the fire in the dreamer’s dream is a sign of the great relief that will come to the people of this dreamer with this vision immediately after they face a lot of fatigue and difficulties in life and nutrition. As for the fire burning in all the houses except one, this vision is a sign and indication of That the country inhabited by the dreamer is teeming with evil, and they are committing indecency and talking about it openly. A house fire, and the owner of the house looking at it from afar, is a sign that this house has been sold and he has gone to live somewhere else. Interpretation of a dream about a house burning in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin said in The interpretation of a dream about a house on fire is that it is one of the disturbing and frightening dreams for those who dream of it, and it contains various topics as follows: Whoever sees in a dream that his house is on fire and he cannot put it out, this vision indicates that the person who had this vision will divorce his wife, because she does not love him and always creates problems for him. And with his family. If the dreamer of this vision extinguishes this fire and extinguishes it without anyone being harmed, then in this way he is extinguishing a temptation that almost separated him from his wife, father, and mother with wisdom and good behavior. . If the dreamer sets fire to his house while laughing in the dream, then this vision indicates that the dreamer will marry a woman whom he does not want to marry despite her beauty, beauty, and morals, and that is why he becomes dry with her. . Seeing a house burning in a pregnant woman’s dream, and she cannot stand to put it out, then this vision is an indication that this woman will face a very difficult situation and will suffer a lot during her birth, and it may be her new baby. He is afflicted. But in a dream, if the sleeper sees that his house has returned to what it was after burning, then this vision in it is a sign of the death of evil, and the arrival of blessing, sustenance, and abundance of life. And when an unmarried woman sees that her father’s house is burning, and she was not harmed by it. Nobody, and the house was not damaged by these fires, so this vision indicates that the girl’s marriage will be delayed to some extent, and is evidence of some

title: What is the interpretation of seeing chicken in a dream?

preview.html: We present to you the interpretation of seeing chickens in a dream on different occasions. Chickens are useful birds for humans, as they use them either to produce eggs or for food. Chickens are included in many delicious recipes in various kitchens around the world. People . Dreaming about chickens is one of the strange dreams that wakes a person from sleep and has a desire to decipher this dream, so join us in this article from the encyclopedia to learn about seeing chickens in dreams and what do they indicate? Interpretation of seeing chickens in a dream Interpretation of seeing a live chicken in a dream for a single womanLive chicken in a dream An unmarried girl does not bode well, as it indicates that she is preparing for marriage, but this marriage will not succeed and she will be miserable in it, and this husband who is about to get married is not the right person for her. But if she sees cooked chicken, this dream is good news for her that she will marry a man who knows her fate. It makes her happy, and it also means that this husband will be one of the rich. The girl who sees that she is buying a lot of chicks in her dream will get a lot of them, God willing. If an unmarried girl is seen slaughtering a chicken, then she will get married without the consent of her family. And the girl who sees white chickens in her dream She promises that there is someone who will propose to her, and that she will be happy with this engagement. And if she sees that she is eating fried chicken, then this dream tells her that she will get a new job or a long trip. Interpretation of seeing a slaughtered chicken in a dream: A woman who sees in her dream that she is slaughtering a chicken, this woman is cursing Her servants, or someone close to her, such as her friend or daughter. It is a message to her to abandon rudeness and have a gentle and kind tongue. So that those close to her do not hate her and leave her alone, fighting life alone. It was said in the interpretation of seeing a woman slaughtering a chicken that it is news of ending the disputes and conflicts that she has been experiencing recently and causing her sadness. If a man dreams of slaughtering a chicken, this is not good, because this dream indicates that This man will divorce his wife or he will travel to a place far away from her and will not be able to determine her condition. Interpretation of a dream about grilled chicken: Eating chicken meat in a dream indicates goodness in general, and seeing eating grilled chicken indicates one’s suffering to reach a certain way of life that God Almighty grants it. As for eating fried chicken, it appears that a person is patient with the evil he suffers from, and that God Almighty will provide him with many good things because of his patience. And whoever eats chicken in a dream, and feels that he does not love her, then this man hates his wife. Whoever sees that he is eating chicken, then he is eating the money of orphans and oppressing them, and this dream is a warning from God Almighty to return the money to its owners, otherwise it will spoil. For him, it will cause him difficulties in the life of this world, and a reward from God, who promised injustice to eat the money of orphans in the afterlife. It is said in the interpretation of eating grilled chicken meat in a dream for a man that it is a warning to this man that he is eating illicit money and that he must search for sources of livelihood that enter his home. And his children. God grants him sustenance, and he receives it

title: Interpretation of seeing the distribution of sweets in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the distribution of sweets in a dream or dream by Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, Al-Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen, or Imam Al-Sadiq via the website Vision Roy2a.com. Distributing sweets in reality is a recurring vision for many, and seeing the distribution of sweets in a dream may indicate goodness, or it may be a warning. Or a warning of the appearance of evil, and the interpreters differed in interpreting the vision of distributing sweets, whether it was a single woman. Married, pregnant or divorced woman with its various connotations. Ibn Kathir, Al-Nabulsi, or Imam Al-Sadiq, so follow us. What is the interpretation of seeing the distribution of sweets in a dream according to Ibn Sirin? Seeing the distribution of sweets in an unmarried girl’s dream is good news for the one whose engagement or wedding is approaching. Seeing the dream distributing sweets is good news for the dreamer to hear happy news. The dream of making candy in a dream is a sign The end of problems and difficulties. Seeing someone giving the fortuneteller sweets is a sign of the coming of goodness and abundant livelihood for the dreamer. A dream of taking sweets in a dream indicates a feeling of happiness that overwhelms God. A dream of eating sweets in a pregnant woman’s dream. A male birthmark. See also: Interpretation of seeing spring in a dream. Sweets in a dream for a married woman. Seeing sweets In a married woman’s dream, it is a sign that she feels joy, happiness, love, and stability in her married life. A dream about sweets in a married woman’s dream is a symbol of hearing happy news. Seeing eating sweets in a married woman’s dream is evidence of many means of livelihood. A dream about buying sweets in a married woman’s dream is an indication of an imminent pregnancy. What is the interpretation of a dream about distributing candy to people for a pregnant woman? Jurists have explained that seeing distributing candy in a dream is generally a good vision. A dream about distributing sweets to people for a pregnant woman is a sign of the arrival of good news. A dream about distributing candy to a pregnant woman is a sign of easy delivery. A dream about taking sweets in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates The birth of a male. See also: Interpretation of seeing food being distributed in a dream. What is the interpretation of distributing chocolate in a dream? Seeing distributing dark chocolate in a dream is a sign of the end of torment and the coming of relief. Dreaming of distributing chocolate in a dream is a sign of the end of sorrows and worries and the emergence of happiness and joy. A dream of distributing chocolate is evidence of love. See also: Interpretation of the vision of distributing dates in a dream. What is the interpretation of the dream of making sweets for a married woman? Ibn Sirin explained that the vision of making sweets is a promising vision. The dream of making sweets in a married woman’s dream is evidence of the end of problems and the collapse of worries. Seeing of making candy in a married woman’s dream is evidence of an imminent pregnancy. A dream of making sweets For a married woman, a sign of happiness. Seeing a dream of distributing sweets to children. Seeing a dream of distributing sweets to children in one dream is a symbol of marriage to a decent man. A dream of distributing sweets to children in a knowledge seeker’s dream is a sign of success. See also: Interpretation of a vision of distributing raw meat in a dream. What is the interpretation of a dream of distributing sweets to relatives? Dreaming of distributing sweets to relatives in a patient’s sleep is good news for recovery from illness. Dreaming of distributing sweets to relatives is a sign that the problems have passed. Yes
